findings.title: Inadequate Event Emission After Price Update
findings.description: It is advised to emit appropriate events after updating the price via setPrice() function.

findings.title: Declare State Variables as Constants
findings.description: It is advised to declare 'usdcAddress' and 'multiplier' state variables as constants to help reduce gas costs.

findings.title: Improper Price Values
findings.description: It is advised to set proper values for maticPrice and usdcPrice as there can be an issue of buying tokens at a rate less than the actual price set due to division done in buy() and buybyUSDC() functions.
